points: Architected a multi-tenant centralised backend with Supabase, unifying authentication and user management across multiple company websites, reducing login friction by 30% and enabling scalable access for thousands of users.

Implemented robust data synchronization protocols that automatically updated databases as connectivity was re-established, ensuring continuous and reliable data access.

company: University of Michigan - Deep Fake Research Lab
points: Collaborated with academic experts to design and validate deepfake detection models using TensorFlow, achieving 88.37% accuracy by benchmarking 8 models across diverse Gen-AI image generation datasets.
